text: Teóphilo Bettencourt Pereira (11 April 1900 – 10 April 1988)CBF profile is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (2): :Fluminense: 1917 :São Cristóvão: 1926 ===National=== * Copa Río Branco (1): :Brazil: 1931 ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Teóphilo
